about_the_game:
This VR game is a time machine. You don't get to choose where you go. When you pull the lever, its random.

You receive a date telling you where you are in time and the doors open. There's no way of predicting where you'll end up.

You can't leave the time machine - but you can stick your head out, but be warned sometimes you might not want to.

Where might I end up?

You might end up somewhere significant or you might end up somewhere totally ordinary.

If you don't like where you are then you pull the lever again.

Have fun!

Controls

The game takes place in a single 2x3m room. You can use teleport and smooth locomotion to move around in the limited space if you would like to play sitting down. Its best played roomscale.

This is a VR game but you will optionally be able to play it in first person mode.

name: The Reality Machine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR

short_description: This 'time machine' takes you where others won't.
